Description_lang: Binds a target to a location after knocking them back, snaring targets by $206384s2% and inflicting $206367s1 Fire damage every half-second. When broken, the bond explodes for $206370s1 Fire damage to targets within $206370A1 yards of the bound target, divided evenly amongst targets hit.
